amendment.description: Amendment expands the list of parties with whom the Federal government is prohibited from contracting due to serious misconduct on the part of the contractors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 114-611 to expand the list of parties with whom the federal government is prohibited from contracting due to serious misconduct on the part of the contractors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Grayson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
